mcq.statement: What was the consequence of recalling Muhammad bin Qasim for the Arab army in the subcontinent?

options.a: It led to the expansion of Arab rule
options.b: It stopped the further advance of Arab army
options.c: It resulted in a civil war

mcq.one_liner: The recall of Muhammad bin Qasim effectively halted the further advance of the **Arab army in the subcontinent**.
